other_tests.findings: Identified a hemizygous variant on chromosome X in the NAA10 gene - p(Ser37Pro). This variant was inherited from the unaffected mother.
Confirmed the presence of patent foramen ovale (PFO) and ventricular septum defect (VSD), resulting in a mild left-right shunt.
Discovered the evolution of the ventricular system from physiological size to middle-grade hydrocephalus.
